products.title: Podium Blackout Midnight Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Podium blackout midnight roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 20.95 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This chic pattern will make a bold graphic statement thanks to its interplay of horizontal lines. Contrasting shades of grey give this streamlined print an intriguing depth and will add a sleek, masculine edge to your space. The podium midnight blackout roller blind is created from durable blackout fabric to help you maintain your peace and privacy in a swift and simple motion using the sidewinder chain.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1953 fabric colour: midnight material: 100% polyester lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Podium Midnight (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure podium midnight (blackout) blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3048mm
 	min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric composition: polyester
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
